forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a predominantly cloudy sky, reminiscent of a gentle gray blanket. The low temperatures linger around a calm fifty-four degrees, offering a coolness that invites a light jacket or sweater. As the day unfolds, the clouds will gradually part, allowing the sun to creep through and paint the world in hues of gold and soft blue. By midday, expect a delightful mix of sunshine and clouds, with temperatures reaching a modest sixty-four before settling into the comforting embrace of sixty-one in the afternoon. The gentle winds, whispering from the west-southwest, will add a slight chill, accompanied by occasional gusts that tease at the edges of your clothes.

Looking out across the bay, one might notice a faint marine layer, teasingly hiding the Golden Gate as the fog dances along the coastline. The weather will be generally pleasant, a perfect backdrop for a leisurely morning stroll along the waterfront or a quiet coffee at your favorite café. As the day matures, consider exploring the local shops or perhaps enjoying a book while basking in a sun-drenched spot, where the vibrant colors of the city seem to come alive with the laughter of passersby. Dress smartly in light layers, prepared for the interplay of sun and cool breezes, and embrace the subtle charm that today’s weather brings to this iconic city.
